title: Literatures of the Global South
description: An introduction to the cultures of various regions of the Global South through close reading of selected literary texts. GSS 21 focuses on the history, culture, and politics of Africa; GSS 22 deals with Latin American and Caribbean history, culture, and politics; GSS 23 examines China and East Asia’s culture, history, and politics; GSS 25 focuses on Middle Eastern culture, history, and politics; GSS 26 teaches South Asia’s history, politics, and culture; and GSS 27 examines Southeast Asia’s history, culture, and politics. Topics will vary each quarter. (F,W,S)
